file_insights.changes_summary: Enhanced error handling for /validate and /metrics commands with structured error creation

patterns_discovered: Implementing domain-specific error handling with context and suggestions
Creating structured errors with additional metadata and guidance
Using error wrapping to preserve original error while adding custom context
Providing actionable suggestions within error messages
gotchas_discovered: Different error scenarios require targeted error creation strategies
Needs granular error types to handle specific failure modes
Error messages should guide users towards resolution

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Update error handling in handleValidate() and handleMetrics()

recommendations: Continue developing granular error handling across the application
Standardize error creation methods for consistency
Add comprehensive error logging and telemetry
Implement error translation for user-facing interfaces
